title: Modular Monosynth
description: The Modular Monosynth web app is a project that is inspired by my passion for modular synthesizers (I design and build my own hardware synths). I wanted to code a web app that could also be a fun synthesizer to play music with. The main library used is Tone.js which build on the Web Audio API.

title: Pokie Free Pubs
description: Pokie Free Pubs is map-website showcasing all of the pubs and clubs in Australia that don't have any pokies. I wanted to highlight places that people with gambling addictions can go whilst still getting that great pub atmosphere.

title: MDI Modular
description: This was my final project at Ironhack. I built a website to showcase and sell sythnesizers that I build in my spare time. The goal was to have a fully functoning e-commerce store including an integrated payment API

title: Re-Co Market
description: Re-Co Market was a project I completed with a fellow student. We wanted to use an external API (in this case we used Discogs) and also use a map integration. The result being a website for users to search for and catalgoue their vinyl records, as well as find other users in who are near by that might be selling records they're interested in.

title: Fly Swatter
description: My first project at Ironhack was to create a video game. I chose to do a remake of the Mario Paint mini-game 'Fly Swatter'. It was made predominantly using the p5 library.
